{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SMC |model=SMC2404WBR |revision=v1 |upc=662698572346 |asin=B00006HMR5 |price=130 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Global Sun |manuf_model=GL2422RP |manuf_rev=-0T3-S01 |availability=EoL |est_release_date=08/02/2002 |fcc_date=05/03/2002 |fcc_id=O7J-GL242204-0T |pcb_id=GL2422RP-0T3-S01 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C4510B |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800BTC-90 |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V653220B |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (32-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Global Sun GL242204-0T |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (32-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=ACX100 |wi1_chip2_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atan |sw_model=AT8985P |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:03:2F |oui_eth=00:03:2F }} "GL2422RP-0T3-S01 V1.0" is silkscreened on the board.
The FCC ID listed on the device (O7J-GL242204) is wrong. :It should instead be O7J-GL242204-0T. The default password is ''blank''.
*The price listed in this entry is per [http://www.practicallynetworked.com/item.asp?pid=509 Practically Networked]. :[http://www.practicallynetworked.com/review.asp?pid=509 Review] â€¢ [http://web.archive.org/web/20091231050718/http://practicallynetworked.com/opinions/show_oppinion.asp?pid=509 User opinions]
